    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030412</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030412</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Reino Plantas</string>
            <string language="en">The plant kingdom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Pflanzenreich</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le royaume d'usine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O reino de planta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il regno di pianta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το βασίλειο εγκαταστάσεων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se describen las características generales de los organismos de este reino. Además, explica el ciclo reproductivo típico, desarrollando las fases en que está dividido.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic describing the general characteristics of the organisms of this kingdom. It also explains the typical reproductive cycle, developing the phases into which it is divided.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Reino Plantas</string>
            <string language="en">Plant kingdom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches die allgemeinen Eigenschaften der 
organismen dieses Königreiches beschreibt. Es erklärt auch die
typische reproduktive Schleife und entwickelt die Phasen, in die sie 
geteilt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet décrivant les caractéristiques 
générales des organizations de ce royaume. Il explique 
également le cycle reproducteur typique, développant les phases 
lesoù il est divisé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que descreve as características gerais 
dos organismos deste reino. Explica também o ciclo reproductive
típico, desenvolvendo as fases em que é dividido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che descrive le caratteristiche generali
degli organismi di questo regno. Egualmente spiega il ciclo 
riproduttivo tipico, sviluppante le fasi in où è diviso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που περιγράφει τα γενικά χαρακτηριστικά των 
οργανισμών αυτού του βασίλειου. Εξηγεί επίσης το 
χαρακτηριστικό αναπαραγωγικό κύκλο, που αναπτύσσει τις φάσεις σε 
τις οποίες διαιρείται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pflanzenreich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Royaume d'usine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reino de planta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Regno di pianta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασίλειο εγκαταστάσεων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
